mutants.code:
def compute_median(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    mid = n / 2
    median = arr[mid]
    return median

def compute_median(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    mid = n * 2
    median = arr[mid]
    return median

def compute_median(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    mid = n // 3
    median = arr[mid]
    return median

    n = len(arr)

    mid = n // 1
    median = arr[mid]
    return median

def compute_median(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    arr.sort()
    mid = n // -2
    median = arr[mid]
    return median
